short_summary: Data and Application Modernization (DAM) Pre-Qualification Refresh List
description: This Request for Proposals (RFP) is for the pre-qualification of vendors for the modernization of data and applications for Farm Credit Canada (FCC). The RFP is part of the process to select vendors for the modernization of FCC's products using a phased approach. The scope of the RFP is to select vendors who can provide data modernization, application modernization, and other related services. The estimated value of the project is $10 million. The term of the contract will be for 3 years, renewable for an additional 2 years.
tags: ,Data, ARCHITECTURE.assuarios-salcarias Investment in the Application portrayal?
full_summary:
**Data and Application Modernization (DAM) Pre-Qualification Refresh List**

**Official Languages:** French and English

**Tender Reference Number:** MX-443143046957 Amendment 5
**Solicitation Number:** PS24-RN-006
**Publication Date:** May 29, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** June 25, 2024, 2:00 PM CST

**Procurement Category:** Service (SRV) and Government (GD)

**Notice Type:** Non-binding, Competitive Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Objective:**
Establish a list of vendors with experience and a successful history of product modernization and data engineering to support Farm Credit Canada's (FCC) IT department.

**Scope:**
FCC seeks to modernize its suite of products used internally and externally to customers. The modernization will involve a phased approach, transitioning from thin client-based to web-based applications and moving from a traditional data warehouse model to an AWS pipeline data infrastructure.

**Services Required:**
The Pre-Qualified List (PQ List) will provide vendors who can offer Data and Application Modernization Services, including:

* Data modernization
* Application modernization
* Roadmapping
* Architecture assessments
* Feasibility studies
* Migration
* Advisory services
* Staff augmentation

**Participation Requirements:**
All conditions for vendor participation are outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents.

**RFP Schedule:**

* RFP Release Date: May 29, 2024
* Proponent questions accepted until June 6, 2024, 2:00 PM CST
* FCC response to proponent questions delivered before June 17, 2024, 5:00 PM CST
* RFP Closing Date: June 25, 2024, 2:00 PM CST

**Contact Information:**

* Ronke Niagwan
* Procurement Manager, FCC
* procurement@fcc.ca
* 000-000-0000

**Attachments and Documents:**
All RFP documents and amendments are available on MERX, a Canadian Public Tenders electronic bidding system.

**Notice URL:**

* English: https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2934449724/abstract?language=EN
* French: https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2934449724/abstract?language=FR

**Procurement Entity:**

* Contracting Entity: Farm
